name: Green vs Red (vaibhavkr)
description:
Welcome to Green vs Red - a Classic 2D Defense Strategy Game!

Place the ranged Green units in the left side of the battlefield such that they can protect your side from the evil Red units!

CREDITS :

Game Developed by : Vaibhav Kumar

Sounds from : Zapsplat.com (Click here to visit)

Made with Pygame
